tool_description: Defines micro-interactions and animations for mobile app interfaces, specifying timing, easing, and animation sequences for enhanced user experience.

animation_targets.description: UI elements to animate (buttons, modals, cards, tabs, loading, etc.)

animation_triggers.description: Animation triggers (tap, load, scroll, swipe, hover, focus)

easing_function.description: Easing function: ease-in, ease-out, ease-in-out, linear, or spring

error_messages: Invalid animation targets: Use recognized UI elements (buttons, modals, cards, tabs, loading, etc.)
Invalid animation triggers: Use tap, load, scroll, swipe, hover, or focus
Invalid timing duration: Value must be between 50 and 2000 milliseconds
Invalid easing function: Use ease-in, ease-out, ease-in-out, linear, or spring
usage: Specify animation_targets and animation_triggers; optionally set timing_duration and easing_function to generate detailed animation specifications.
